overview: When Galang tries to forget her fiance, fate brings him to Laras, a sweet girl who melts his heart. Unfortunately, Galang's temperament distanced himself from Laras. Not intentionally, Galang successfully beat up Lara's father who he suspected a criminal. Lara's father also had to be hospitalized because of good intentions of Galang who spread peanut butter.  Galang and Lara's love increasingly complicated by the presence of a new boarding house residents, Donny. Youth calm but this cunning, guile have a million in his brain to get the heart Laras. Strategy struggle of "muscle" versus "brain" between Galang and Donny grab attention of Laras who was unavoidable. Discos and aided by a motivator psychiatric first-class, Galang trying to control his emotions in order to win the battle against Donny
title: Senggol Bacok
